articles.author: Katrin Bennhold
articles.title: Angela Merkel's Last Day as Germany's Chancellor: Live Updates - The New York Times
articles.description: Angela Merkel received a standing ovation in Germany’s Parliament as the vote to approve her successor, Olaf Scholz, got underway. His inauguration begins a new chapter for Europe’s largest democracy.
articles.content: For the photographer Herlinde Koelbl, the end of Angela Merkels tenure as Germanys chancellor isnt just the end of a political era its also the end of one of the longest-running art projects in world… [+3083 chars]

articles.title: WHO says European COVID rates now highest in children, vaccine mandates should be 'last resort' - ABC News
articles.description: The World Health Organization says more needs to be done to protect schools amid a rapid increase in cases among children in Europe, the world's COVID epicentre.
articles.content:
The World Health Organization's office for Europe says children between five and 14 years old now account for the highest rates of reported COVID-19 infections in the region.
